p: SARS-CoV-2 affects all peoples, especially those who had weak immune systems and/or week immune-based responses. Coronaviruses (CoVs) belonged to the sub-family of Ortho-coronavirinae, under the Coronaviridae family and in order of Nidovirales, and this sub-family contains alpha-, beta-, gamma-, and delta-CoVs ( Banerjee et al., 2019 ). The deadliness of CoVs has been identified by the outbreaks of severe observation of acute respiratory syndrome (SARS-CoV) in 2002/2003 and the Middle East Respiratory Syndrome (MERS-CoV) in 2012/2013. SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV are going to Î²-CoV ( Zhang et al., 2020 ). Freshly, a new flu-like CoV (COVID-19) associated with SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV was realized in the late of 2019 and spread worldwide with a pandemic ( Cohen and Normile, 2020). The total number of cases globally was 91,322,850 and 1,952,979 confirmed deaths in WHO situation report COVID-19 in January 12, 2021 (worldmeters.info).
